statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({7.88}+{7.1}\right)}={29.96}\approx{29.96}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{7.1}\cdot{7.49}={53.179}\approx{53.2}.
